TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 路由事件以及相关的附加事件和预览事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for and routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件数据类与以下附加事件一起使用：This event data class is used with the following attached events: - - 此事件数据类还与基元素上的以下路由事件一起使用。This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 这些路由事件转发前面列出的附加事件，使其在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的常规元素模型中更易于访问。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加事件和基本元素路由事件共享其事件数据，路由事件的冒泡和隧道版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 这可能会影响事件在传输事件路由时的已处理特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For details, see [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 如果处理 事件或 事件（ 设置为事件数据中的 `true`），键盘焦点将不会更改。If the event or the event is handled ( is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change. 如果处理 事件或 事件，键盘焦点将不会更改。If the event or the event is handled, keyboard focus will not change.

summary.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用事件处理程序，这样做可以提高事件系统效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将泛型处理程序强制转换为 ，然后调用它。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 有关此实现模式及其原因的详细信息，请参阅 和[路由事件概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview).
